Reviews.Title: Good clarity and affordable
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: Night vision is great and daytime clarity is as well. Would recommend to anyone looking for budget security. Not much more I say

Reviews.Title: Took a chance. Turned out great
Reviews.Author: parker
Reviews.Content: Pros: I bought 2 of these refurbished cameras to upgrade my lorex home dvr kit. The cameras from the kit had miserble night vision and were blurry. These cameras are clear and the nightvision is much better. Very solid construction. Seems well built.Cons: One of the cameras has a minor scratch on the lens but picture is still fine.Other Thoughts: Mounting system is very good. Came with cable and power adapters are plus

ProductInfo.Name: Swann PRO-640 Surveillance Camera - Color, Monochrome
